product_name: Seals Cockpit Seal - Elie Sound 120 XE
long_description: Designed for the Elie Sound 120 XE Kayak, this puncture-proof Seals single cockpit seal is perfect for keeping water, leaves and unwanted critters out of your kayak during storage and transport. Tear-resistant, nylon-reinforced PVC material provides long-lasting service and protection with superior UV-resistance. Strong, bungee-powered rim grip system secures cover firmly to cockpit coaming. Front webbing grab loop with tether hook assists in installation and removal; tether hook clips to deck rigging to prevent loss. Webbing loop with nylon webbing strap and side-release buckle wraps around hull for extra security during transport. Double-stitched construction ensures long-lasting wear.
short_description: Designed for the Elie Sound 120 XE Kayak, this puncture-proof Seals single cockpit seal is perfect for keeping water, leaves and unwanted critters out of your kayak during storage and transport.
